summary: Application showing signs of memory leak and degraded response times. Cart service experiencing high garbage collection overhead and checkout endpoint timeouts increasing.

log_snippets.text: Full GC triggered: heap usage 95%, collection took 2.1s
OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
Connection pool exhausted: 0 of 20 connections available

findings.description: Memory usage climbing steadily with frequent full GC cycles indicating potential leak in cart service.
Response times degrading, particularly P95/P99 latencies affecting user experience.
Thread pool and database connection pool nearing capacity, may cause cascading failures.
Error rate elevated above normal baseline of 0.5%, indicating system stress.

recommended_actions.action: Generate heap dump and analyze for memory leaks in cart session management
Restart cart service instances to clear memory and implement rolling restart schedule
Increase JVM heap size to 4GB and tune GC settings for better performance
Scale up database connection pool from 20 to 40 connections
Implement circuit breaker pattern for external payment service calls
Add application-level monitoring alerts for heap usage > 85%
Review and optimize cart cleanup job to prevent memory accumulation
